game.name: Archer Master 3D Castle Defense
game.description:
Out of countless free action games available online, Archer Master 3D: Castle Defense is possible the most in-demand one. This brand new online game has everything that an ardent fan of action game wants. It will be amazing to prepare yourself for the terrifying battles. Get ready to learn how to apply an easy-to-operate bow on the training field! Inhabitants have a strong faith on you, so apply your shooting skills to hit train targets successfully. Use your bow to shoot at the invading enemies fast before they kill you and capture your area!

In this cool defensive game, you are considered as the last person who has dare to defend the castle. No inhabitants except you know how to fight against the enemies. Come forward and restrain the attacks made by your enemies on the fortress. In a few seconds, you will see the hordes of enemies coming to you. A large number of wizards, witches, knights, archers, scouts and even dragons will try to kill you. There will be no time to be relaxed. So, keep fighting until you bring the victory to your home. Your enemies will keep attacking on you in all the seasons, including sunny, rainy, summer or winter. 

You have the guts to respond their attacks with your ultimate weapon carrying power in this one of the best shooting games. So, play wisely and complete all the missions timely. Keep collecting the points you find on the way to upgrade your character. This will help you to fight against your enemies with the stronger body. This 3D action game features a realistic archery gameplay, upgradable characters, different enemies to kill, 10 different character options and 30 missions to complete. Play this free online shooting game in your PC, android or iOS phone and gaming console!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Archer Master 3D Castle Defense at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.webControlKeys: WA,S,D ALL ARROWS-MOVE, MOUSE-LOOK AROUND,SPACE-JUMP,SHIFT-RUN,E-EQUIP THE BOW,L MOUSE-SHOOT,HOLD RIGHT MOUSE-AIM,HOLD L MOUSE WHILE AIMING TO DRAW THE STRING HARDER,WHEEL-ZOOM IN/OUT,Z,X- SHOOT
